• Multiplayer mining game with real-time physics and procedurally generated maps
  • Supports both desktop and mobile controls with touch-optimized interfaces
  • Features mining, building, trading, and social interaction with other players
  • Persistent world saves with cloud synchronization and admin controls
  • Includes shop system, upgrades, and various tools like teleporters and explosives
    const TILE_TYPES = { EMPTY: 0, DIRT: 1, STONE: 3, IRON: 7, GOLD: 8, DIAMOND: 9, ... }
    const CONSTANTS = { TILE_SIZE: 32, CHUNK_SIZE: 16, MAP_WIDTH: 1000, MAP_HEIGHT: 2000, ... }

This web-based multiplayer mining game lets players explore procedurally generated underground worlds while mining resources, building structures, and trading with other players. The game features real-time physics, day/night cycles, and supports both desktop and mobile devices with optimized controls. Players can upgrade their mining equipment, manage inventories, and participate in a persistent economy with shops and trading systems. The game includes cloud save functionality, admin controls for hosts, and various tools like teleporters and explosives for enhanced gameplay.
